entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
